trait.name: Warrior Unit
entries: As a group of humanoids, the unit has the following effects:

items: The unit can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the <name> can move through an opening wide enough for a Medium creature. In addition, the unit is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the unit is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the unit is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet can use its action to merge into the unit, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the swarm equal to five times its CR. The creature must share one of the following tags with the unit; Ambusher, Artillery, Brute, Skirmisher, Soldier or Support. For example, a {@creature hoplite (CR 1)|J:Warriors|hoplite} can merge into a {@creature Phalanx (CR 1)|J:Units|phalanx} as they share the Soldier tag.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The artillery battalion makes two weapon attacks. It cannot use this action if it is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Slings and Arrows
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 5}, range 150/600 ft., one target {@h} 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Sidearms
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 5 ft., one target {@h} 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Volley
entries: Each creature within 20 feet of a point the artillery battalion can see must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 1d12}) piercing damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage if the artillery battalion is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}. A creature takes half damage on a success.

variant.name: Variant Units
entries: At the DM's discretion, a unit may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

items.name: Arcane Warriors
entries: The unit knows a cantrip of the DM's choice that has a casting time of 1 action. If the unit has the Multiattack action, it can replace one attack with a casting of the cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma (DM's choice) is the unit's spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

items.name: Arsonists
entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to ignite a flamable object, or 10-foot section of a structure, within 5 feet of it.

items.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to make breath weapon attack in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + PB + Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma modifier) or take PBd10 damage of one of the following types; acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison. A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The unit has darkvision out to 60 feet.

items.name: Enhanced Movement
entries: The unit has a climbing or swimming speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Heavily Armoured
entries: The unit has a +2 bonus to its AC, however, its speed is reduced by 5 feet.

items.name: Large
entries: The unit is composed of at least some Large creatures. The unit's size category is increased by one and it can move through and opening wide enough for a Large creature.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The unit has resistance to a damage type of the DM's choice.

items.name: Rip and Tear
entries: When the unit hits a creature in its space with a melee attack, that creature begins {@condition Bleeding|J:General}.

items.name: Small
entries: The unit is composed of entirely Small humanoids and can move through and opening wide enough for a Small creature.

variant.name: Skinchanger Unit
entries: The unit is composed of skinchangers, some or all of which are in bestial forms. The unit's statistics are unchanged, except the DM may choose to change the damage type of their weapon attacks and they gain one of the following benefits based on the most common beast form among them:

items.name: Bears, Elephants or Rhinos
entries: Once per turn, when the unit hits a creature with a melee attack, they can force the creature to make a Strength saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + the modifer used for the attack) or be knocked {@condition prone|XPHB}.

items.name: Boars, Horses or Stags
entries: If the unit moves at least 20 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack, the attack deals an additional PBd4 damage.

items.name: Crabs, Sharks or Squids
entries: The unit has a swimming speed equal to its walking speed, can breathe underwater and has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks while underwater.

items.name: Hyenas, Lions, or Wolves
entries: The unit has advantage ability checks that rely on hearing or smell. They also have advantage on melee attacks against creatures within its space.

items.name: Rats, Snakes or Spiders
entries: Once per turn, when the unit hits a creature with a melee attack, they can force the creature to make a Constituion saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + the modifer used for the attack) or be poisoned until the start of the unit's next turn.

entries: As a group of humanoids, the unit has the following effects:

items: The unit can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the <name> can move through an opening wide enough for a Large creature. In addition, the unit is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the unit is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the unit is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet can use its action to merge into the unit, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the unit equal to five times its CR. The creature must share one of the following tags with the unit; Ambusher, Artillery, Brute, Skirmisher, Soldier or Support. For example, a {@creature hoplite (CR 1)|J:Warriors|hoplite} can merge into a {@creature Phalanx (CR 1)|J:Units|phalanx} as they share the Soldier tag.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cavalry makes two weapon attacks. It cannot use this action if it is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Lances and Sabres
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 10 ft., one target {@h} 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing or piercing damage.

action.name: Stampede
entries: The cavalry moves up to 40 feet in a straight line. Each creature whose space the cavalry passes through must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 1d12}) bludgeoning damage, or 4 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage if the cavalry is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, and be knocked {@condition Prone|XPHB}. A creature takes half damage and is not knocked prone on a success. A creature that is already prone when it makes the saving throw has disadvantage on the saving throw.

bonus.name: Nimble Action
entries: The cavalry takes the {@action Dash|XPHB} or {@action Disengage} action.

bonus.name: Scatter the Infantry
entries: When the cavalry hits a Medium or smaller creature with a melee attack, it can force each Medium or smaller creature within 10 feet of the target to make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the target.

variant.name: Variant Units
entries: At the DM's discretion, a unit may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

items.name: Arcane Warriors
entries: The unit knows a cantrip of the DM's choice that has a casting time of 1 action. If the unit has the Multiattack action, it can replace one attack with a casting of the cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma (DM's choice) is the unit's spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

items.name: Arsonists
entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to ignite a flamable object, or 10-foot section of a structure, within 5 feet of it.

items.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to make breath weapon attack in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + PB + Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma modifier) or take PBd10 damage of one of the following types; acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison. A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The unit has darkvision out to 60 feet.

items.name: Enhanced Movement
entries: The unit has a climbing or swimming speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Heavily Armoured
entries: The unit has a +2 bonus to its AC, however, its speed is reduced by 5 feet.

items.name: Large
entries: The unit is composed of at least some Large creatures. The unit's size category is increased by one and it can move through and opening wide enough for a Large creature.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The unit has resistance to a damage type of the DM's choice.

items.name: Rip and Tear
entries: When the unit hits a creature in its space with a melee attack, that creature begins {@condition Bleeding|J:General}.

items.name: Small
entries: The unit is composed of entirely Small humanoids and can move through and opening wide enough for a Small creature.

variant.name: Skinchanger Unit
entries: The unit is composed of skinchangers, some or all of which are in bestial forms. The unit's statistics are unchanged, except the DM may choose to change the damage type of their weapon attacks and they gain one of the following benefits based on the most common beast form among them:

items.name: Boars, Horses or Stags
entries: If the unit moves at least 20 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack, the attack deals an additional PBd4 damage.

items.name: Crabs, Sharks or Squids

items.name: Hyenas, Lions, or Wolves

entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to make breath weapon attack in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + PB + Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma modifier) or take PBd10 damage of one of the following types; acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison. A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The unit has darkvision out to 60 feet.

items.name: Enhanced Movement
entries: The unit has a climbing or swimming speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Heavily Armoured
entries: The unit has a +2 bonus to its AC, however, its speed is reduced by 5 feet.

items.name: Large
entries: The unit is composed of at least some Large creatures. The unit's size category is increased by one and it can move through and opening wide enough for a Large creature.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The unit has resistance to a damage type of the DM's choice.

items.name: Rip and Tear
entries: When the unit hits a creature in its space with a melee attack, that creature begins {@condition Bleeding|J:General}.

items.name: Small
entries: The unit is composed of entirely Small humanoids and can move through and opening wide enough for a Small creature.

variant.name: Skinchanger Unit
entries: The unit is composed of skinchangers, some or all of which are in bestial forms. The unit's statistics are unchanged, except the DM may choose to change the damage type of their weapon attacks and they gain one of the following benefits based on the most common beast form among them:

items.name: Bears, Elephants or Rhinos
entries: Once per turn, when the unit hits a creature with a melee attack, they can force the creature to make a Strength saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + the modifer used for the attack) or be knocked {@condition prone|XPHB}.

items.name: Boars, Horses or Stags
entries: If the unit moves at least 20 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack, the attack deals an additional PBd4 damage.

items.name: Crabs, Sharks or Squids
entries: The unit has a swimming speed equal to its walking speed, can breathe underwater and has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks while underwater.

items.name: Hyenas, Lions, or Wolves
entries: The unit has advantage ability checks that rely on hearing or smell. They also have advantage on melee attacks against creatures within its space.

items.name: Rats, Snakes or Spiders
entries: Once per turn, when the unit hits a creature with a melee attack, they can force the creature to make a Constituion saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + the modifer used for the attack) or be poisoned until the start of the unit's next turn.

trait.name: Warrior Unit
entries: As a group of humanoids, the unit has the following effects:

items: The unit can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the <name> can move through an opening wide enough for a Medium creature. In addition, the unit is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the unit is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the unit is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet can use its action to merge into the unit, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the swarm equal to five times its CR. The creature must share one of the following tags with the unit; Ambusher, Artillery, Brute, Skirmisher, Soldier or Support. For example, a {@creature hoplite (CR 1)|J:Warriors|hoplite} can merge into a {@creature Phalanx (CR 1)|J:Units|phalanx} as they share the Soldier tag.

trait.name: Crew the Ship
entries: When the ship crew uses its action to act as the crew of a ship, it counts as a number of crew equal to 20% of its current hit points (rounded down, minimum of 1).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ship crew makes two weapon attacks. It cannot use this action if it is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Axes and Knives
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 5}, reach 10 ft., one target {@h} 8 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Slings and Arrows
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 5}, range 30/120 ft., one target {@h} 7 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) bludgeoning or piercing damage.

action.name: Grappling Hooks
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 5}, range 30/120 ft. one Large or larger object. {@h} The object is pulled 10 feet towards the ship crew.

If the target is a vehicle and ends this movement within 10 feet of the ship crew, the target cannot move away from the ship crew until a creature within 5 feet of the target uses an action to remove the hooks or the ship crew releases it (no action required).

variant.name: Variant: Crew Actions vs Ship Actions
entries: The current version of this statblock assumes a ruleset in which the ship itself has actions and the crew simply contribute to those actions by numbers alone. If you are not using such a ruleset or the ship does not use its own actions, such as spelljammers, you may wish with to replace the Crew the Ship trait with the folllowing:

entries.name: Crew Actions
entries: While on board a ship they control, the ship crew takes one of the following actions:

items.name: Move
entries: The ship moves up to a number of feet equal to five times its Proficiency Bonus, or half as far if {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} (minimum of 5 feet).

items.name: Fire
entries: The ship crew loads, aims and fires a weapon mounted on the vehicle. The attack deals additional damage equal to twice its Proficiency Bonus unless the crew is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

items.name: Repair
entries: The ship crew touches a component or weapon of the vehicle and restores a number of hit points to it equal to five times its Proficiency Bonus, or half as much if {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} (minimum of 1 hit point).

items.name: Brace
entries: The crew protects a itself, a creature, or a component or weapon on the ship within 5 feet. Attacks against the target have disadvantage until the start of the crew's next turn. It cannot use this action if {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

variant.name: Variant Units
entries: At the DM's discretion, a unit may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

entries: The unit knows a cantrip of the DM's choice that has a casting time of 1 action. If the unit has the Multiattack action, it can replace one attack with a casting of the cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma (DM's choice) is the unit's spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

entries: When the ship crew uses its action to act as the crew of a ship, it counts as a number of crew equal to 20% of its current hit points (rounded down, minimum of 1).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ship crew makes two weapon attacks. It cannot use this action if it is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Axes and Knives
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 9}, reach 10 ft., one target {@h} 32 ({@damage 5d6 + 14}) slashing damage.

action.name: Slings and Arrows
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 9}, range 30/120 ft., one target {@h} 27 ({@damage 5d4 + 14}) bludgeoning or piercing damage.

action.name: Grappling Hooks
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 9}, range 30/120 ft. one Large or larger object. {@h} The object is pulled 20 feet towards the ship crew.

If the target is a vehicle and ends this movement within 10 feet of the ship crew, the target cannot move away from the ship crew until a creature within 5 feet of the target uses an action to remove the hooks or the ship crew releases it (no action required).

variant.name: Variant: Crew Actions vs Ship Actions
entries: The current version of this statblock assumes a ruleset in which the ship itself has actions and the crew simply contribute to those actions by numbers alone. If you are not using such a ruleset or the ship does not use its own actions, such as spelljammers, you may wish with to replace the Crew the Ship trait with the folllowing:

entries.name: Crew Actions
entries: While on board a ship they control, the ship crew takes one of the following actions:

items.name: Move
entries: The ship moves up to a number of feet equal to five times its Proficiency Bonus, or half as far if {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} (minimum of 5 feet).

items.name: Fire
entries: The ship crew loads, aims and fires a weapon mounted on the vehicle. The attack deals additional damage equal to twice its Proficiency Bonus unless the crew is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

items.name: Repair
entries: The ship crew touches a component or weapon of the vehicle and restores a number of hit points to it equal to five times its Proficiency Bonus, or half as much if {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB} (minimum of 1 hit point).

items.name: Brace
entries: The crew protects a itself, a creature, or a component or weapon on the ship within 5 feet. Attacks against the target have disadvantage until the start of the crew's next turn. It cannot use this action if {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

variant.name: Variant Units
entries: At the DM's discretion, a unit may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

items.name: Arcane Warriors
entries: The unit knows a cantrip of the DM's choice that has a casting time of 1 action. If the unit has the Multiattack action, it can replace one attack with a casting of the cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma (DM's choice) is the unit's spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

items.name: Arsonists
entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to ignite a flamable object, or 10-foot section of a structure, within 5 feet of it.

items.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to make breath weapon attack in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + PB + Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma modifier) or take PBd10 damage of one of the following types; acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison. A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The unit has darkvision out to 60 feet.

items.name: Enhanced Movement
entries: The unit has a climbing or swimming speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Heavily Armoured
entries: The unit has a +2 bonus to its AC, however, its speed is reduced by 5 feet.

items.name: Large
entries: The unit is composed of at least some Large creatures. The unit's size category is increased by one and it can move through and opening wide enough for a Large creature.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The unit has resistance to a damage type of the DM's choice.

items.name: Rip and Tear
entries: When the unit hits a creature in its space with a melee attack, that creature begins {@condition Bleeding|J:General}.

items.name: Small
entries: The unit is composed of entirely Small humanoids and can move through and opening wide enough for a Small creature.

variant.name: Skinchanger Unit
entries: The unit is composed of skinchangers, some or all of which are in bestial forms. The unit's statistics are unchanged, except the DM may choose to change the damage type of their weapon attacks and they gain one of the following benefits based on the most common beast form among them:

items.name: Bears, Elephants or Rhinos
entries: Once per turn, when the unit hits a creature with a melee attack, they can force the creature to make a Strength saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + the modifer used for the attack) or be knocked {@condition prone|XPHB}.

items.name: Boars, Horses or Stags
entries: If the unit moves at least 20 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack, the attack deals an additional PBd4 damage.

items.name: Crabs, Sharks or Squids
entries: The unit has a swimming speed equal to its walking speed, can breathe underwater and has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks while underwater.

items.name: Hyenas, Lions, or Wolves
entries: The unit has advantage ability checks that rely on hearing or smell. They also have advantage on melee attacks against creatures within its space.

items.name: Rats, Snakes or Spiders
entries: Once per turn, when the unit hits a creature with a melee attack, they can force the creature to make a Constituion saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + the modifer used for the attack) or be poisoned until the start of the unit's next turn.

trait.name: Warrior Unit
entries: As a group of humanoids, the unit has the following effects:

items: The unit can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the <name> can move through an opening wide enough for a Medium creature. In addition, the unit is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the unit is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the unit is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet can use its action to merge into the unit, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the swarm equal to five times its CR. The creature must share one of the following tags with the unit; Ambusher, Artillery, Brute, Skirmisher, Soldier or Support. For example, a {@creature hoplite (CR 1)|J:Warriors|hoplite} can merge into a {@creature Phalanx (CR 1)|J:Units|phalanx} as they share the Soldier tag.

20x20 ft. Square or a 30x15 ft. Line

trait.name: Hold the Line
entries: Creatures smaller than the phalanx cannot enter its space unless it lets them or a magic effect specifically allows them to.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The phalanx makes two weapon attacks. It cannot use this action if it is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Pikes and Spears
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 8}, reach 10 ft., one target {@h} 34 ({@damage 4d10 + 12}) piercing damage.

action.name: Javelins
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 8}, range 30/120 ft., one target {@h} 26 ({@damage 4d6 + 12}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Pike Wall
entries: When a creature moves into the reach of the phalanx's Pike attack, the phalanx can use a reaction to make a Pike attack against that creature. If the creature is Large or larger, the phalanx has advantage on this attack.

variant.name: Variant Units
entries: At the DM's discretion, a unit may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

items.name: Arcane Warriors
entries: The unit knows a cantrip of the DM's choice that has a casting time of 1 action. If the unit has the Multiattack action, it can replace one attack with a casting of the cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma (DM's choice) is the unit's spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

items.name: Arsonists
entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to ignite a flamable object, or 10-foot section of a structure, within 5 feet of it.

items.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to make breath weapon attack in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + PB + Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma modifier) or take PBd10 damage of one of the following types; acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison. A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The unit has darkvision out to 60 feet.

items.name: Enhanced Movement
entries: The unit has a climbing or swimming speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Heavily Armoured
entries: The unit has a +2 bonus to its AC, however, its speed is reduced by 5 feet.

items.name: Large
entries: The unit is composed of at least some Large creatures. The unit's size category is increased by one and it can move through and opening wide enough for a Large creature.

items.name: Resistance
entries: The unit has resistance to a damage type of the DM's choice.

items.name: Rip and Tear
entries: When the unit hits a creature in its space with a melee attack, that creature begins {@condition Bleeding|J:General}.

items.name: Small
entries: The unit is composed of entirely Small humanoids and can move through and opening wide enough for a Small creature.

variant.name: Skinchanger Unit
entries: The unit is composed of skinchangers, some or all of which are in bestial forms. The unit's statistics are unchanged, except the DM may choose to change the damage type of their weapon attacks and they gain one of the following benefits based on the most common beast form among them:

items.name: Bears, Elephants or Rhinos
entries: Once per turn, when the unit hits a creature with a melee attack, they can force the creature to make a Strength saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + the modifer used for the attack) or be knocked {@condition prone|XPHB}.

items.name: Boars, Horses or Stags
entries: If the unit moves at least 20 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack, the attack deals an additional PBd4 damage.

items.name: Crabs, Sharks or Squids
entries: The unit has a swimming speed equal to its walking speed, can breathe underwater and has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks while underwater.

items.name: Hyenas, Lions, or Wolves
entries: The unit has advantage ability checks that rely on hearing or smell. They also have advantage on melee attacks against creatures within its space.

items.name: Rats, Snakes or Spiders
entries: Once per turn, when the unit hits a creature with a melee attack, they can force the creature to make a Constituion saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + the modifer used for the attack) or be poisoned until the start of the unit's next turn.

trait.name: Warrior Unit
entries: As a group of humanoids, the unit has the following effects:

items: The unit can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the <name> can move through an opening wide enough for a Medium creature. In addition, the unit is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the unit is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the unit is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet can use its action to merge into the unit, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the swarm equal to five times its CR. The creature must share one of the following tags with the unit; Ambusher, Artillery, Brute, Skirmisher, Soldier or Support. For example, a {@creature hoplite (CR 1)|J:Warriors|hoplite} can merge into a {@creature Phalanx (CR 1)|J:Units|phalanx} as they share the Soldier tag.

trait.name: Lines and Squares
entries: The phalanx can use half its movement to reshape itself into one of the following shapes based on its size:

entries: The unit has resistance to a damage type of the DM's choice.

items.name: Rip and Tear
entries: When the unit hits a creature in its space with a melee attack, that creature begins {@condition Bleeding|J:General}.

items.name: Small
entries: The unit is composed of entirely Small humanoids and can move through and opening wide enough for a Small creature.

variant.name: Skinchanger Unit
entries: The unit is composed of skinchangers, some or all of which are in bestial forms. The unit's statistics are unchanged, except the DM may choose to change the damage type of their weapon attacks and they gain one of the following benefits based on the most common beast form among them:

items.name: Bears, Elephants or Rhinos
entries: Once per turn, when the unit hits a creature with a melee attack, they can force the creature to make a Strength saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + the modifer used for the attack) or be knocked {@condition prone|XPHB}.

items.name: Boars, Horses or Stags
entries: If the unit moves at least 20 feet in a straight line immediately before hitting with a melee attack, the attack deals an additional PBd4 damage.

items.name: Crabs, Sharks or Squids
entries: The unit has a swimming speed equal to its walking speed, can breathe underwater and has advantage on Strength and Dexterity checks while underwater.

items.name: Hyenas, Lions, or Wolves
entries: The unit has advantage ability checks that rely on hearing or smell. They also have advantage on melee attacks against creatures within its space.

items.name: Rats, Snakes or Spiders
entries: Once per turn, when the unit hits a creature with a melee attack, they can force the creature to make a Constituion saving throw (DC equals 8 + PB + the modifer used for the attack) or be poisoned until the start of the unit's next turn.

trait.name: Warrior Unit
entries: As a group of humanoids, the unit has the following effects:

items: The unit can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the <name> can move through an opening wide enough for a Medium creature. In addition, the unit is immune to spells and magic effects that would alter its size.
While the unit is not {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}, it has advantage on all saving throws.

If the unit is missing hit points another creature within 5 feet can use its action to merge into the unit, destroying itself and restoring a number of hit points to the swarm equal to five times its CR. The creature must share one of the following tags with the unit; Ambusher, Artillery, Brute, Skirmisher, Soldier or Support. For example, a {@creature hoplite (CR 1)|J:Warriors|hoplite} can merge into a {@creature Phalanx (CR 1)|J:Units|phalanx} as they share the Soldier tag.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The warband makes two weapon attacks. It can replace any of these attacks with its Battlecry. It cannot use this action if it is {@variantrule Bloodied|XPHB}.

action.name: Axes and Spears
entries: {@atkr mw} {@hit 8}, reach 5 ft., one target {@h} 34 ({@damage 4d10 + 12}) slashing or piercing damage plus an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) if the target is {@condition Frightened|XPHB} by the warband.

action.name: Barrage
entries: {@atkr rw} {@hit 8}, range 30/90 ft., one target {@h} 26 ({@damage 4d6 + 12}) slashing or piercing damage.

action.name: Battlecry
entries: A creature of its choice that it can see within 30 feet and that can hear the warband must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition Frightened|XPHB} by the warband for one minute (save ends).

bonus.name: We are coming for you
entries: The warband takes the {@action Dash|XPHB} or {@action Disengage|XPHB} action.

Alternatively, if a creature it can see within 60 feet is {@condition Frightened|XPHB} of it, it can take both actions as part of the same bonus action. If it does so it must end the current turn closer to the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} creature or become {@condition Dazed|J:General} until the end of its next turn.

variant.name: Variant Units
entries: At the DM's discretion, a unit may have one or more additional traits providing some varity. This trait might represent aleigence to a particular faction, the racial makeup of its members or even just a little extra flavor. Some examples are included below.

items.name: Arcane Warriors
entries: The unit knows a cantrip of the DM's choice that has a casting time of 1 action. If the unit has the Multiattack action, it can replace one attack with a casting of the cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma (DM's choice) is the unit's spellcasting ability for this cantrip.

items.name: Arsonists
entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to ignite a flamable object, or 10-foot section of a structure, within 5 feet of it.

items.name: Breath Weapon
entries: The unit can use an action (or replace one attack it makes with its Multiattack action) to make breath weapon attack in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw (DC 8 + PB + Intelligence, Wisdom or Charisma modifier) or take PBd10 damage of one of the following types; acid, cold, fire, lightning or poison. A creature takes half as much damage on a successful save.

items.name: Darkvision
entries: The unit has darkvision out to 60 feet.

items.name: Enhanced Movement
entries: The unit has a climbing or swimming speed equal to its walking speed.

items.name: Heavily Armoured
entries: The unit has a +2 bonus to its AC, however, its speed is reduced by 5 feet.
